title: Shaco vs Akali
body: They've both been trashed by this update, but who takes the title of worst assassin now?

replies.body: May they make brand lose his stun and have twice as high of mana costs so you are away of what you are calling "fine".

Hybrid Shaco still seems to work fairly well so some buffs might fix him

Akali on the other hand got her damage gutted by lower numbers and longer cooldowns as well as her functionality made extremely clunky and her shroud lost 4 different ways you could use it to get a rather minimal sized "flash" added to it.
Akali has been completely gutted by this rework. At least AP Shaco is still viable.

Akali is fine, shaco felt pretty fuckin awful tbh
Most people on the PBE were building him AP though
